description:
Princess Melonia now wants the love potion from the Bandshees, who were a pop sensation back in the day. To find the elixir and its gatekeepers, Chup and company enlist Peter Pancake, a self-proclaimed, roly-poly survivalist. ”Ranger Pancake” leads the pack on what might be a wild goose chase. Through it all, Chup remains a believer in the power of a greasy waffler.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スーパー探検家ピーターパンパン
